Variable: :math:`\text{CH}_4` Crop Anaerobic Decomposition Emission Factor
Information: Annual average :math:`\text{CH}_4` (methane) emitted per ha of crop grown. **Rice** is the only crop that should be non-zero. This will be 0 for most crops (or negligible).

Variable: :math:`\text{CO}_2` Crop Biomass Emission Factor
Information: Annual average :math:`\text{CO}_2` (carbon dioxide) emitted per mass of crop grown due to biomass growth and associated changes in carbon stock. Applies only to perennial woody crops.
Notes: See sections 5.2.1 and 5.2.2 of the `IPCC Guidelines for National Greenhouse Gas Inventories <https://www.ipcc.ch/report/2019-refinement-to-the-2006-ipcc-guidelines-for-national-greenhouse-gas-inventories/>`_

Variable: :math:`\text{N}_2\text{O}` Crop Biomass Burning Emission Factor
Information:
| Annual average :math:`\text{N}_2\text{O}` (nitrous oxide) emitted per mass of crop residue burned.
 | 
 | See V4, C2, Equation 2.27 and Table 2.5 for equation and default emission factors.

Variable: AGRC Combustion Factor
Information: The combustion factor :math:`C_f` gives the "proportion of prefire fuel biomass consumed" by fires. See Table 2.6, IPCC GNGHGI (2019R).

Variable: Above Ground Residue Dry Matter Intercept
Above Ground Residue Dry Matter Slope
Dry Matter Fraction of Harvested Crop
Information: See :math:`DRY` in Equation 11.7 in IPCC GNGHGI and Table 11.1A (2019R)

Variable: Fraction of Food Loss Sent to Landfill
Information: Some food lost in the supply chain is sent to landfills. This variable represents the fraction of total food that is lost in production that is sent to landfills (integrated with waste model).

Variable: Fraction of Food Produced Lost Before Consumption
Information: Fraction of food that is produced that is lost or wasted before selling. This fraction represents production-side waste (post-yield) and does not include waste by consumers.

Variable: Fraction of Residues Burned
Information: Total of Fraction of Residues Removed and Fraction of Residues Burned must be less than or equal to 1.

Variable: Fraction of Residues Removed
Information: Total of Fraction of Residues Removed and Fraction of Residues Burned must be less than or equal to 1.

Variable: N Content of Above Ground Residues
Information: See :math:`N_{AG(T)}` in Equation 11.6 in IPCC GNGHGI and Table 11.1A (2019R)

Variable: N Content of Below Ground Residues
Information: See :math:`N_{BG(T)}` in Equation 11.6 in IPCC GNGHGI and Table 11.1A (2019R)

Variable: Ratio of Above Ground Residue to Harvested Yield
Ratio of Below Ground Biomass to Above Ground Biomass
:math:`\text{CH}_4` Emissions from Rice
:math:`\text{CO}_2` Emissions from Biomass Carbon Stock Changes
:math:`\text{CO}_2` Emissions from Soil Carbon in Mineral Soils
Information: N Mineralization in conversion to cropland

Variable: :math:`\text{CO}_2` Emissions from Soil Carbon in Organic Soils
Information: Emissions of :math:`\text{CO}_2` in from drained organic soils.

Variable: :math:`\text{N}_2\text{O}` Emissions from Biomass Burning
:math:`\text{N}_2\text{O}` Emissions from Crop Residues
Total Food Loss Sent to Landfills
Information: Total food lost in agriculture production due to waste, supply chain inefficiences, poor harvesting practices, and more that is sent to landfills.

Variable: Total Food Produced Lost Before Consumption
Information: Total food lost in agriculture production due to waste, supply chain inefficiences, poor harvesting practices, and more.
